Package skywaysolutions.app.sales

Interface ISalesAccessor

All Superinterfaces:
IRepairable
All Known Implementing Classes:
SaleController
public interface ISalesAccessor extends IRepairable
Provides the sales accessor interface for the package.
Author:
Alfred Manville

  • Method Details

    • sell

      long sell(long blank, long customer, SaleType type, Decimal commissionRate, Date dueDate, Date saleDate, Decimal cost, Decimal tax, Decimal secondaryTax, String currency, Decimal costPreDiscount) throws CheckedException
      Sells a blank to the specified customer for the specified type of sale, with a specific commission rate, a due date, a sale date, a cost, taxes, currency and a cost pre discount.
      Parameters:
      blank - The blank to be sold.
      customer - The customer ID to sell the blank to.
      type - The type of sale.
      commissionRate - The commission rate on the sale.
      dueDate - The due date of the sales payments.
      saleDate - The date the sale was created.
      cost - The cost of the blank.
      tax - The tax on the blank.
      secondaryTax - The secondary tax on the blank.
      currency - The currency of the sale.
      costPreDiscount - The cost pre discount, can be null.
      Returns:
      The sale ID.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error occurred during the sale.

    • transact

      long transact(long saleID, Date date, String currency, Payment payment) throws CheckedException
      Performs a transaction for the specified sale on a specified date with the type of currency being used and the payment being made.
      Parameters:
      saleID - The ID of the sale.
      date - The date of the transaction.
      currency - The currency of the transaction.
      payment - The payment of the transaction.
      Returns:
      The transaction ID.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error occurred during the transaction.

    • fullyPaid

      boolean fullyPaid(long saleID) throws CheckedException
      Checks if a sale has been fully paid.
      Parameters:
      saleID - The sale ID.
      Returns:
      If the sale has been fully paid.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The sale could not be retrieved.

    • late

      boolean late(long saleID, Date date) throws CheckedException
      Checks if a sale is late (Is overdue and not fully paid).
      Parameters:
      saleID - The sale ID.
      date - The current date.
      Returns:
      If the sale is overdue for payment.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The sale could not be retrieved.

    • refund

      long[] refund(long saleID, Date date) throws CheckedException
      Refunds or gets the refunds of a sale.
      Parameters:
      saleID - The sale ID.
      date - The date of any new refunds (null to get existing refunds).
      Returns:
      The IDs of the refunds.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The refund operation / obtaining the refund IDs has failed.

    • getSales

      long[] getSales(MonthPeriod period, PaymentType type, String currency) throws CheckedException
      Gets the sales given the period, type of payment and the currency.
      Parameters:
      period - The month of the sales (Null for any time).
      type - The type of payment.
      currency - The currency of the sale, if null, this filter is ignored.
      Returns:
      An array of sale IDs.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Retrieving the sales has failed.

    • getSalesByStaff

      long[] getSalesByStaff(MonthPeriod period, PaymentType type, String currency, long staffID) throws CheckedException
      Gets the sales given the period, type of payment, the currency and the staff ID.
      Parameters:
      period - The month of the sales (Null for any time).
      type - The type of payment.
      currency - The currency of the sale, if null, this filter is ignored.
      staffID - The ID of the staff member.
      Returns:
      An array of sale IDs.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Retrieving the sales has failed.

    • getSalesByCustomer

      long[] getSalesByCustomer(MonthPeriod period, PaymentType type, String currency, long customerID) throws CheckedException
      Gets the sales given the period, type of payment, the currency and the customer ID.
      Parameters:
      period - The month of the sales (Null for any time).
      type - The type of payment.
      currency - The currency of the sale, if null, this filter is ignored.
      customerID - The ID of the customer.
      Returns:
      An array of sale IDs.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Retrieving the sales has failed.

    • getTransactions

      long[] getTransactions(long saleID) throws CheckedException
      Gets the transactions of a specified sale.
      Parameters:
      saleID - The sale ID.
      Returns:
      The array of transaction IDs.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Retrieving the transactions has failed.

    • getSale

      Sale getSale(long saleID) throws CheckedException
      Gets the sale given the ID. This will also refresh the cache.
      Parameters:
      saleID - The sale ID.
      Returns:
      The sale corresponding to the ID.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Retrieving the sale has failed.

      Transaction getTransaction(long transactionID) throws CheckedException
      Gets the transaction given the ID. This will also refresh the cache.
      Parameters:
      transactionID - The transaction ID.
      Returns:
      The transaction corresponding to the ID.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Retrieving the transaction has failed.

    • getRefund

      Refund getRefund(long refundID) throws CheckedException
      Gets the refund given the ID. This will also refresh the cache.
      Parameters:
      refundID - The refund ID.
      Returns:
      The refund corresponding to the ID.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Retrieving the refund has failed.

    • blankSold

      boolean blankSold(long blankID) throws CheckedException
      Gets if the specified blank has been sold.
      Parameters:
      blankID - The blank ID.
      Returns:
      If the blank has been sold.
      Throws:
